reviews.title: Double down casino
reviews.comment: Game freezes a lot and slots don\'t always pay out .fix this and I\'ll fix my review

reviews.title: Fix it

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: This app took 25,000,000 of my chips playing slots and black jack.... After you place bet it closes out app and u lose ur chips from your bet. DDC IS A SCAM ALL THEY WANT IS YOUR MONEY. YOU TRY TO CONTACT THEM THEY DON\'T RESPOND.

reviews.title: Game and bonus
reviews.comment: Every time I go to play or collect and send game credits it always freezes and stops and says error on page then I lose out on my credits and so do my friends, this gets very  fraustrating and annoying please fix this and give back credits where they are due, on the plus side this is one of my favourites.also could you please bring back the brady bunch and put it on ipad and other mobile devices.Thank you.

reviews.title: Poor game play

reviews.title: Its OKLAHOMA
reviews.comment: Missing my favorite, Fireworks! After reading post-update reviews I think I\'ll wait to update. I play constantly daily, both on FB(pc) and as a guest(mobile). Get with it devs! Fix the slow connections & dropped signals as well a s the pathetic daily spins of 4, 5&6k. You probably won\'t lose me but you\'re going to lose a lot of players real soon. Also on the mobile app, the daily spin subtracts1000. Check it out. And bring Fireworks to mobile! Thanks
